rationale: The segment does not contain an intensifier or comparative directly modifying a risk-adjective.
The segment does not contain high-potency verbs, potent metaphors, superlative negative nouns, or critical alert phrases.
No loaded rhetorical question is present in the text.
The segment reports factual distribution without explicit calming language.
Segment does not contain a minimiser used in conjunction with a scale contrast.
The segment does not contain a bare negation about risk, spread, impact, evidence, or capability.
Describes geographic distribution of cases, not capability/preparedness/safeguard.
The segment reports locations of human cases, not economic data.
The segment reports locations of past human cases, not speculation about future relief.
Quote provides factual statement about location of cases, not explicit framing.
Factual report of locations of human cases. No explicit framing cues.
